title: Nicola Sturgeon – 2017 Speech at SNP Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Nicola Sturgeon, the Scottish First Minister and Leader of the SNP, at the party’s conference in Glasgow on 10 October 2017.
